description: Gets information about a specified evidence item.

parameters.name: assessmentId
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the assessment.

parameters.name: controlSetId
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the control set.

parameters.name: evidenceFolderId
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the folder that the evidence is stored in.

parameters.name: evidenceId
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the evidence.

nested_items.name: dataSource
nested_items.description: The data source where the evidence was collected from.

nested_items.name: evidenceAwsAccountId
nested_items.description: The identifier for the Amazon Web Services account.

nested_items.name: time
nested_items.description: The timestamp that represents when the evidence was collected.

nested_items.name: eventSource
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Service that the evidence is collected from.

nested_items.name: eventName
nested_items.description: The name of the evidence event.

nested_items.name: evidenceByType
nested_items.description: The type of automated evidence.

nested_items.name: resourcesIncluded
nested_items.description: The list of resources that are assessed to generate the evidence.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the resource.

nested_items.name: value
nested_items.description: The value of the resource.

nested_items.name: complianceCheck
nested_items.description: The evaluation status for a resource that was assessed when collecting compliance check evidence.
Audit Manager classes the resource as non-compliant if Security Hub reports a Fail result, or if Config reports a Non-compliant result.
Audit Manager classes the resource as compliant if Security Hub reports a Pass result, or if Config reports a Compliant result.

nested_items.type: such as manual evidence, Amazon Web Services API calls, or CloudTrail
nested_items.description: If a compliance check isn't available or applicable, then no compliance evaluation can be made for that resource. This is the case if a resource assessment uses Config or Security Hub as the underlying data source type, but those services aren't enabled. This is also the case if the resource assessment uses an underlying data source type that doesn't support compliance checks (such as manual evidence, Amazon Web Services API calls, or CloudTrail).

nested_items.name: attributes
nested_items.description: The names and values that are used by the evidence event. This includes an attribute name (such as allowUsersToChangePassword) and value (such as true or false).
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: iamId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the user or role that's associated with the evidence.

nested_items.name: complianceCheck
nested_items.description: The evaluation status for automated evidence that falls under the compliance check category.
Audit Manager classes evidence as non-compliant if Security Hub reports a Fail result, or if Config reports a Non-compliant result.
Audit Manager classes evidence as compliant if Security Hub reports a Pass result, or if Config reports a Compliant result.

nested_items.type: such as manual evidence, Amazon Web Services API calls, or CloudTrail
nested_items.description: If a compliance check isn't available or applicable, then no compliance evaluation can be made for that evidence. This is the case if the evidence uses Config or Security Hub as the underlying data source type, but those services aren't enabled. This is also the case if the evidence uses an underlying data source type that doesn't support compliance checks (such as manual evidence, Amazon Web Services API calls, or CloudTrail).

nested_items.name: awsOrganization
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services account that the evidence is collected from, and its organization path.

nested_items.name: awsAccountId
nested_items.description: The identifier for the Amazon Web Services account.

nested_items.name: evidenceFolderId
nested_items.description: The identifier for the folder that the evidence is stored in.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The identifier for the evidence.

nested_items.name: assessmentReportSelection
nested_items.description: Specifies whether the evidence is included in the assessment report.
